title: Blackstone Earnings Fall to $1.22 Billion
sub_head: Firm’s private-equity portfolio handily outperformed the S&P 500 but fell short of its year-earlier performance
body:
Blackstone Inc.’s first-quarter earnings fell as the value of the private-equity giant’s investments climbed at a slower pace.
The New York firm reported net income of $1.22 billion, or $1.66 a share, compared with $1.75 billion, or $2.46, in the same period last year.
